meta.title: Features — GetLifeUndo
meta.description: What GetLifeUndo can do: extended clipboard history, restore closed tabs and sessions, exports, safety and dozens of helpful tools.
hero.title: GetLifeUndo features
hero.lead: “Ctrl+Z” for online life: recover lost text, tabs, clipboard history, quick notes and entire working sessions — neatly and safely.
pro.title: What’s included in {tier}
pro.items.clipboard: Clipboard history: up to {count} recent items with instant search
pro.items.tabs: Undo for closed tabs and sessions
pro.items.forms: Autosave for input fields (forms, posts, comments)
safe.title: Why it’s safe
safe.items.local: Local-first by default, encryption for sync
safe.items.permissions: Granular permissions: only what’s truly needed
start.title: How to get started
start.step1: Install the browser extension (Chrome / Firefox / Edge)
start.step2: Open the extension settings and activate your license
start.step3: Enable form autosave and clipboard history
start.step4: Try the “Undo panel” on your frequent sites
cards.forms.title: Form autosave
cards.forms.text: Protect yourself from accidental refreshes and crashes — your text won’t be lost.
cards.history.title: Smart history
cards.history.text: Filter by site, date and type: text, link, note, fragment.
cards.export.title: Export & transfer
cards.export.text: Export data, move your profile or make a backup in one click.
